TopicTitle: As some of you may have noticed...

Articles.Content:
...I have been inactive for quite a while.

This is due to 3 significant reasons

[list type=decimal]

[li]I Don\'t play KSP a lot, it just chews up too much memory on my computer to play it smooth :C[/li]

[li]I have lost interest in the SF-IPS project because of complexity, lack of demand, and more importantly, other games and making new stuff there, ESPECIALLY TF2[/li]

[li]The Roleplaying sub-forum is no more, and other roleplaying forums that sprouted because of this have been anything but interesting and/or have been complete bullsh!t[/li]

this may or may not mean I quit, but what this means is a lack of activity, sorry to those that were looking forward to the project (though i bet you didn\'t have a crap to give)

Just kidding...

Why do you care so much about RP?
Because it was fun, obviously. Why do you like space?

Because it was fun, obviously. Why do you like space?

because why not? 8)

'gets shuddering memory of chronic, real-life experience'
Radion\'s RP forum is better than the old one ever war, BTW. Also, Spearka, you can probably get your island back now that Ascensiam took it. He did the same with Jhazeria.
